name: Other party has applied for a FO - you need to apply  (Joint SOLICITOR) (copy)
body:
Case number: ((reference number))
Applicant 1: ((applicant1FullName))
Applicant 2: ((applicant2FullName))
Issue date: ((issueDate))
Your reference: ((solicitor reference))

Dear ((solicitor name))

The other party in the above case has applied for a final order as a sole applicant. You were given 2 weeks notice of their intention to apply. 

if the final order is granted then the ((isDivorce??marriage))((isDissolution??civil partnership)) will be legally ended. 

Divorce and Dissolution
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm)

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email
subject: Action required: ((reference number))
